multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is diffusion in the context of deep learning?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: A method for generating images from noise.
A method for stabilizing the training of deep learning models.
A method for reducing the memory usage of deep learning models.
A method for speeding up the training of deep learning models.
